verses.text: \w This|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \add time\add* I am \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*. \w In|strong="G1909"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* \w shall|strong="G2476"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* be \w established|strong="G2476"\w*.

I told you \w before|strong="G4280"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* foretell \w you|strong="G4302"\w*, as \w if|strong="G5613"\w* I were \w present|strong="G3918"\w*, the second \w time|strong="G1208"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* being \w absent|strong="G0548"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which heretofore have \w sinned|strong="G4258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, I \w will|strong="G5339"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w spare|strong="G5339"\w*:

\w Since|strong="G1893"\w* ye \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* a \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you-ward|strong="G5209"\w* \w is|strong="G0770"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* is \w mighty|strong="G1414"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w through|strong="G1537"\w* \w weakness|strong="G0769"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w also|strong="G2249"\w* are \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w in|strong="G0846"\w* \w him|strong="G0235"\w*, \w but|strong="G2198"\w* we shall \w live|strong="G4862"\w* \w with|strong="G0846"\w* \w him|strong="G1537"\w* \w by|strong="G1411"\w* the \w power|strong="G2316"\w* of \w God|strong="G1519"\w* \w toward|strong="G5209"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Examine|strong="G3985"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w be|strong="G2075"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w prove|strong="G1381"\w* your own \w selves|strong="G1438"\w*. Know \w ye|strong="G1921"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* your own \w selves|strong="G1438"\w*, how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w except|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w be|strong="G2075"\w* \w reprobates|strong="G0096"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye shall \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w reprobates|strong="G0096"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w pray|strong="G2172"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G4160"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* should \w appear|strong="G5316"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* should \w do|strong="G4160"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w honest|strong="G2570"\w*, \w though|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w reprobates|strong="G0096"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we can \w do|strong="G1410"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* are \w glad|strong="G5463"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* we are \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G5600"\w* \w strong|strong="G1415"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we \w wish|strong="G2172"\w*, \add even\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w perfection|strong="G2676"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w being|strong="G2443"\w* \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* being \w present|strong="G3918"\w* I should \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w sharpness|strong="G0664"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* to the \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w destruction|strong="G2506"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w farewell|strong="G5463"\w*. Be \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w*, be of good \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w*, \w be|strong="G5426"\w* of \w one|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w*, live in \w peace|strong="G1514"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.
\w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w communion|strong="G2842"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The second \add epistle\add* to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, \add a city\add* of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
